title: Mini spinach and feta rolls
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 to 2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '250g frozen spinach, thawed in a colander', 'salt to taste', '100g feta cheese, crumbled', '3 sheets puff pastry, thawed if frozen', '1 egg, mixed with 1 tablespoon milk', 'sesame seeds for sprinkling (optional)']
